> <OLD>
>
> "could be a trap from Unicrom..."hissed Hydras"He had been quiet in last
> months, I wont be surpriced if he does a surprice come back"

<NEW>

Cryotek blinked, it was almost as if he hadn't realized that, but then
a quick michievious look showed that maybe he had.

"You know that is surprising!" he said as he smiled, covering what
ever look that was on his face, "Perhaps it is a trap, perhaps not."
Cryotek gestured at one of the monitors that showed the rest of
Hydras' team standing out waiting for him to return, "I would imagine
that with you and your team you would be more than a match for
whatever the Unicronians could throw at you."

(TAG)

Preston
